name: Aqua Ball Lines Pro
description:
"This app takes place under the sea, it has great picture with lots of colour, plus music that makes you feel like you are underwater. Definitely a great puzzle game that will make you want to beat your high score." --iviewapps

★★★★★★ Main Features ★★★★★★
- Classic ball in lines game
- Game Center and Open Feint support
- Nice music that makes you feel like you are underwater
- Useful tutorial
